attributes.action: keep the minimum wage equal across the entire British Isles and not single out places like Northern Ireland and reduce their minimum wage therefore creating a second class citizenship
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown has said he plans to reduce the mimimum wage for Northern Ireland and other regions within the UK and raise other areas like London. I believe that this is the start of creating an underclass of citizenship within the British Isles and can only lead to its future break up. If this is to be prevented then it is important that certain rights, like that of the mimimum wage, are kept as unilaterial laws.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
